title: How should I build a PC for editing 4K video? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well get a Ryzen with 8 cores and an 1070ti or a 2080ti 32GB ram and a copple 10TB drives your set for a year or 3 i recommend water cooling if your gonna use it 24/7 because it’ll make your hardwere last a bit longer and cooler. Pcpartpicker for selecting your hardware and also you'll want to get a good Ultrawide or 4K panel for viewing the content i personally use a Z35 from acer.

Your going to want to focus on having a good amount of good RAM, a fast CPU and a fast GPU and of course a 4k monitor so you can view the final product at it’s native resolution. There are fancy keyboards tailored to video editing that you may want to consider as well. Storage space and other peripherals come as a lower priority if you’re on a budget.
